snippet.title: Just Dance 2022: Todrick Hall Announce Trailer | Ubisoft [US]
snippet.description:
Announcing Just Dance 2022 with Todrick Hall! Learn more on how to be a part of this collab: https://ubi.li/p36QB

Coming to Nintendo Switch, Xbox One, Xbox Series X, PS4, PS5 and Google Stadia!

#JustDance2022 #JustDance

An Audio Described version of this trailer is available here: https://youtu.be/RZEo_FQktiY 

Please SUBSCRIBE:
https://www.youtube.com/user/justdancegame

Follow Just Dance:
Website: https://justdance.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/justdancegame
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/justdance.usa/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/justdancegame_us
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@justdance_officialgame

ABOUT JUST DANCE 2022:
Grab your friends and family because it's time to turn up the volume and let loose with Just Dance 2022! 
The #1 Music Video Game Franchise of All Time,  with over 77million units sold, is back this fall with 40 new  songs and universes, Just Dance will get you moving all year long!
Join a community of more than 138 million players around the world and dance it out!

Just Dance 2022: Todrick Hall Announce Trailer | Ubisoft [US]
https://www.youtube.com/justdancegame
